has research problem.from sentence: MEMEN : Multi-layer Embedding with Memory Networks for Machine Comprehension

has research problem: Machine comprehension ( MC ) style question answering

has research problem.from sentence: Machine comprehension ( MC ) style question answering is a representative problem in natural language processing .
Machine comprehension ( MC ) has gained significant popularity over the past few years and it is a coveted goal in the field of natural language processing and artificial intelligence .
